attributes.action: introduce legislation (THAT'S WHAT WE WANT HIM TO DO!) to make it illegal to use the term 'free treatment' when talking about medical treatment under the National Health Service and to replace it with the term 'taxpayer funded treatment'.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: NHS treatment is NOT free.  NHS treatment is 'taxpayer funded' and it should be stated as such.
